entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4.
